title: Urinating in a dream and the interpretation of a dream about a dead person urinating in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of seeing urination in a dream. Urination is a process carried out by humans and animals, which is the exit of urine from the bladder and out of the entire body. This process occurs voluntarily, especially in healthy people, and it occurs involuntarily for children. If you have a dream and do not find its interpretation, go to Google and write an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about urine. Urine in a dream is considered a sign of many positive things, including sustenance and abundance of money, including marriage if the dreamer is single, and paying debts if the dreamer is in distress and has many debts. If the dreamer urinates in a place that is strange to him or not. He knows something about him in reality, as this indicates his mingling with the people of that place, and this vision is evidence that the dreamer will marry a woman who is not of his blood or his. His relatives. If the dreamer sees that a little girl is urinating on her, this is evidence that goodness will come to her, and Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing a boy’s urine is evidence of happiness and comfort. A married man who urinates on his clothes in a dream indicates that he has children, and if he urinates more than once in a dream , this is evidence that he will have many children in several consecutive years. Seeing urine of a married woman by Sheikh Waseem Youssef confirms that she is happy at home with her husband and children, and she interpreted that she sees urine retention as a good thing that awaits shame soon. Black urine is depression and delusion in the dream. As for brown urine, it means food and money for the fortuneteller, and seeing brown urine confirms that his need will be met in the near future. But if the fortuneteller is suffering from worries, then God will ease his distress and remove his worries in the near future. The dreamer’s dream of urinating in the street without shame is evidence of sustenance, and urinating in the street With a feeling of shame, it is evidence of scandal. The urination of a sick person in a dream is evidence of his recovery, and the urination of a person suffering from distress in a dream is evidence that the doors of livelihood and money will be opened before him. The urine of a divorced woman in a dream, mixing it with the urine of a strange man, is evidence of weakness and marriage to a man with whom they are in a state of equality or understanding. Between them in reality. A pregnant woman urinating in a dream is evidence that she will receive money immediately after giving birth, and this vision indicates an easy birth and the absence of any pain. The more urine spreads throughout the dreamer’s clothes or throughout the place where he is sitting, the longer it will remain. If he sees that he is urinating dark urine and then his urine is clear, this is evidence that he has been freed from it. The sins that he was committing and he will return to God. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person urinating in a dream: Seeing a married woman urinating one of her dead wives on her bed and looking for a way to have children, then this vision is good news that she will have children in the near future. If the dreamer sees that his dead father is urinating with feces, This is evidence that this dead person is suffering from severe torment in the grave and needs someone to stand by him and atone for his sins, and therefore this vision carries within it a strong meaning. The message is to help the dead person while he is in the hands of God until he passes through the stage of torment, and is helped in this by reciting the Qur’an or giving alms for his soul. If the mother urinates

title: Interpretation of seeing fish according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing fish according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. The fish is one of the details that scholars have explained in their books on the interpretation of dreams. There are many cases in which fish appear in a dream. They can appear alive and swim in the water and have beautiful vessels, or they can appear dead or raw, or they can appear. Served as a meal and cooked, each of these instances has a different interpretation and its own meaning. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing fish according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a fish for a girl in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Sirin When the dreamer, who is a girl, sees in a dream carrying one fish, this may indicate that the dreamer will enjoy wealth and prosperity. Also, when you see the dreamer, who is an unmarried girl, and there is a fish in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will be blessed with good news about the imminent fulfillment of the desire she wants.• When the dreamer, who is an unmarried girl, sees and there is a fish in the dream, this may indicate The dreamer strongly desires to fulfill a desire, which may be marriage, a job, or anything else. Also, when you dream of the unmarried dreamer eating fish and the fish is cooked and not raw, this may indicate that the dreamer will bring her a lot of sustenance and money. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a fish for a married woman in a dream When the dreamer, who is a married woman, sees her having a fish in a dream, This may indicate that the dreamer will enjoy abundant wealth, a lot of money, and an abundant life. Also, when the married dreamer sees her husband giving her a fish in a dream, it may mean that the dreamer will get good news that she may become pregnant during the year she saw it. Vision.• As for seeing the dreamer married and having a fish in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will have good news and will fulfill many wishes. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a fish for a pregnant woman in a dream• When the dreamer sees a woman carrying a fish in her dream If there was a live fish in the dream, this may mean that the dreamer will give birth to a male child. Also, when you see the dreamer, a woman, carrying a fish in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will be blessed with great kindness and great power. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a fish for a man in a dream: When the dreamer sees a fish in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will bring him Lots of goods, food, and abundant money. Interpretation of a dream about seeing fish in a dream: When the dreamer sees that he is eating a fish and that this fish has been cooked in the dream, this may mean that the dreamer will enjoy good news and good luck. Also, when the dreamer sees that he ate a fish and the taste of that fish was delicious in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will be blessed with marriage. When the dreamer sees that he has eaten a fish and its taste is salty in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will provide him with a lot Of sustenance. When it ends When you see that the dreamer ate a fish and that the fish tasted sweet in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer

title: Interpretation of seeing the muezzin in a dream in detail

preview.html: Seeing the muezzin in a dream symbolizes a person who signals a good person or an authorized person to one person, and dreaming of a well-known person making the call indicates that you will hear good advice and words from him. Only God knows. Interpretation of seeing the muezzin in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing the muezzin in a dream as a person calling for good or a delegate and getting married. A dream about a muezzin may refer to a broker or a king’s guard, and whoever sees the muezzin in his dream and his voice is beautiful, this is evidence of the ease of things. And the situation improves. Seeing a woman leading the prayer in the mosque in a dream means the spread of strife or heresy among the people. Whoever sees a child giving the call to prayer in a dream, this is evidence of the ignorant seizing power, and the dream of a stranger giving the call to prayer shows the actions of the sultan with his subjects. Seeing a muezzin who is not beautiful in a dream It means being robbed. Likewise, if the dreamer sees in a dream that the muezzin is raising the call to prayer and changing it, then this is evidence of being exposed to deception and hypocrisy. For the muezzin to dream of calling to his house means news and announcement in the house, and it may indicate a death, and whoever dreams of a muezzin calling on the roof of his house, this is evidence of bad news. The opinion of others. People of the household and dreaming of hearing the call to prayer of the muezzin to the market indicates poverty and bankruptcy. Interpretation of seeing the muezzin in a dream according to Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi will interpret the muezzin in a dream as a good-looking person who brings good news. A dream of an unknown muezzin can indicate a warning and a warning to obey, and whoever sees a well-known muezzin in a dream, this is a reminder of obedience and duties. The muezzin in a dream refers to an unmarried person. Closing the wedding. If the dreamer sees in a dream that the muezzin is calling for prayer outside of his time, this is evidence that he is in a major relationship, and that he saw the muezzin calling for prayer outside of the qibla. dream. It shows the spread of corruption and rebellion among people. Seeing the muezzin naked in a dream indicates a disturbance that will harm the fortuneteller, and seeing the muezzin dead in a dream means neglecting duties such as prayer and fasting. Hearing the muezzin raising the call in Morocco in the month of Ramadan in a dream is evidence of attaining blessings, pleasure, and freedom from difficulties. Seeing the muezzin raising the call to prayer in a dream indicates respect for the rituals of religion, and hearing the muezzin in the dawn prayer saying that prayer is better than sleep in a dream indicates the necessity of fulfilling trust. Interpretation of seeing the muezzin in a dream for a single woman. Seeing the muezzin in a dream for an unmarried woman portends a close marriage with a good person. The muezzin’s dream of an unmarried girl indicates abundant sustenance and satisfaction of desires. Hearing the call to prayer in a dream indicates to unmarried women that they should always pray and worship, and when an unmarried girl hears the beautiful voice of the muezzin in a dream, this is evidence of changes in her life for the better. If an unmarried girl sees a well-known person calling for prayer in a dream, This is evidence that she will receive good help from him, and seeing an unknown person calling in a dream indicates an increase in her religion and obedience. If an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream calling for prayer, this is evidence that she is spreading discord.

title: Interpretation of seeing a turtle in a dream

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansInterpretation of a dream about having a turtle in a dream. A turtle is a pet that many people keep at home because its movement is slow and it does not make noise wherever it is, but seeing a turtle in a dream has many different meanings according to its presence and position in each dream above the other, and this we will know. In this topic about the interpretation of seeing a turtle in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a turtle in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a turtle in a dream as good and the appearance of many positive things for the dreamer. Whoever sees in his dream that he bought a turtle, this is a sign of good deeds and closer to God. Also, seeing a green sea turtle in a dream indicates the high status of the dreamer and his assuming a great position. It also indicates knowledge, means of living, abundance of money, and healing of the sick. Seeing one eating turtle meat in a dream indicates beneficial work and memorizing the Holy Qur’an. Interpretation of seeing a turtle in a dream According to Al-Nabulsi: In interpreting a dream about a turtle in a dream, Al-Nabulsi approached the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, where he said: Whoever sees a turtle entering his house, this indicates a mixed marriage with a God-fearing woman, who has noble morals. . The turtle, his knowledge is in the wrong place. Interpretation of seeing a turtle in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen said: Whoever sees a turtle in his house in his dream is a sign of great blessing and goodness for him and his family. Interpretation of seeing a turtle in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees that she is carrying a turtle in her dream, then this Evidence of her marriage to a generous and generous man. And if the turtle is in the dream between her legs, this is evidence of her marriage to a righteous, God-fearing person. Interpretation of seeing a turtle in a dream for a married woman: A married woman who sees a turtle living in her house in a dream is evidence of sustenance and goodness in her marital and family life, and that her husband fears God and is loyal to him, and seeing a turtle in her bed indicates her pregnancy. Pregnancy.Interpretation of seeing a turtle in a pregnant woman’s dream: A pregnant woman seeing a turtle during her sleep indicates the ease of giving birth or giving birth to a male child. Anyone who has a vision and wants to interpret it, we take your comments at the end of the article and we will give you the interpretation as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of the letter Ain in a dream according to Imam Jaafar Al-Sadiq

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of the letter A in a dream by Imam Al Sadiq via the Shamloul website The letter A is one of the letters of the alphabet that carries many symbols and associations that appear in a dream with the letter A in, including the calf, the dough, the wheel, the pubic, the knot, the eyes, the lenses, nudity, and others. Among the symbols that we will include throughout the article. Today, according to what Imam Jaafar al-Sadiq said. Interpretation of a dream about a calf by Imam al-Sadiq. The calf in a dream, as narrated by Imam Jaafar al-Sadiq, is a sign of males introducing females. Only God is supreme and most knowledgeable, and it is specifically in the dream of a married or married person, and it is also one of the dreams Which portends the death of fear, security in the future, security and stability in life. God knows best. A dream about pubic hair by Imam Al-Sadiq. The pubic is one of the symbols that when seen in a dream raises many questions in the dreamer’s mind. The pubic hair in a married woman’s dream is a sign of divorce and rivalry. To see the dreamer removing his hair and shaving it is a sign of the disappearance of his worries and problems and the ability to repay debts, and God knows best. The threshold in a dream of Imam Al-SadiqThe threshold is one of the symbols that refers to a woman in a man’s dream. Seeing placing or installing the threshold in a dream means approaching marriage, and seeing a change in the threshold in a married man’s dream means divorce and desertion between the spouses, God forbid. Interpretation of the letter Ain by Al-Nabulsi The dream messageDough in a dream for Imam Al-SadiqSymbols of dough Money appears to be near the bay, especially when it is fermented, swollen and not sour, and seeing sour dough, this indicates the deterioration of the material and social conditions in the dreamer’s life, and God knows best. A dream of the Imam al-Sadiq tribe Sweat is one of the symbols that seeing it in a dream is considered a cure for a disease, if it is The dreamer is sick and sees himself in a dream sweating coldly, and the opposite happens when he sees hot sweat, which is what warns him. . The term of approaching and death, God forbid. See honey for Imam Al-SadiqHoney is one of the most praiseworthy symbols that can be seen in a dream, which bodes well for the pioneer. Seeing honey in a patient’s dream is a symbol that portends an imminent recovery, and eating honey in a dream is a symbol that heralds recovery. Symbols that indicate lawful money are blessed there, and God knows best. The bird in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqSeeing a bird in a dream is a symbol that carries many interpretations and expressions. It is a symbol of having fun, wasting time and chasing worthless things. As for seeing a slaughtered bird, it is a symbol of a weak boy, and God knows best. The scorpion in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. The scorpion tower is an unwanted symbol in a dream that portends many problems and challenges. It can warn the dreamer that he is subjected to intense hatred and envy from his loved ones. It is also a sign of the dreamer’s pain. . Obsessions and exposure to grave calamities, God forbid. Chewing gum in a dream for Imam Al-SadiqGum or incense, as it is called, is one of the symbols that indicate the commission of immorality and sins and the accumulation of sins in the dreamer, i.e.

title: Interpretation of seeing wine in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansWine is one of the forbidden drinks that religion advises against approaching and drinking, as it leads to distraction and one can commit many crimes, as it contains a lot of health harms. There are many types of wine like beer, and it also contains a percentage of alcohol that leads to Sugar, wine, whiskey, and wine of all kinds come from some natural plants and fruits. Seeing wine in a dream has different meanings and interpretations, explained by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, and its interpretation differs when a man sees it in a dream. It depends on its appearance and vision. Interpretation of a dream about wine by Ibn Sirin: I drink wine inside the dream. The coupon indicates money and food that the individual will receive. Drinking wine in a dream indicates the recovery of the sick person. Whoever dreams that he is pressing grapes and dates for wine, this is bad and unpopular, because he may It leads him to quit his job and reduce his livelihood. Seeing beer in a dream indicates illegal money, the source of which is unknown. Whoever dreams that he drinks alcohol and does not drink, this is evidence of money and abundance of livelihood. Whoever sees that he drank alcohol and got married, his wife becomes pregnant. Interpretation of a dream about wine for NabulsiNabulsi will be confirmed if Drinking alcohol in a dream is undesirable, because whoever dreams of drinking alcohol will suffer a great sin. Drinking alcohol in a dream means eating forbidden money, and this money is the same amount of alcohol that you drank. If one sees in a dream that he is bringing wine or buying it, this indicates That the dreamer will fall into a great catastrophe. Whoever sees that he has fallen into a river of alcohol will be tempted in this world. Whoever sees in his dream that he is drunk and among the righteous and religious, this indicates his closeness to God Almighty. Whoever sees that he is treading on alcohol, a lot of misfortunes will happen to him. Happy and good things. Interpretation of a dream about wine for unmarried women. If an unmarried woman sees that she is drinking wine and does not get drunk, this indicates goodness and happiness. If you see yourself drinking wine in a dream even when you are drunk - this indicates worry and anxiety. Interpretation of a dream about wine for a pregnant womanIf she sees A pregnant woman being drunk indicates her happiness and joy with the new baby. Interpretation of a dream about wine for a married woman: Wine in a married woman’s dream has different interpretations. This may be evidence of the neglect she is falling into and the neglect of her husband and home. A better explanation is that her husband will find a new, prestigious job. Add the dream you want interpreted in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and explain it

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing Umrah in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Umrah: Going to perform Umrah is a dream for many people, as it is a visit to the Grand Mosque, and the pilgrim can perform many rituals related to Umrah, such as circumambulation, searching, and entering ihram. People seek to collect money to go in order to demand this duty with which they atone for their deeds and draw closer to God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Umrah. Umrah has many rituals that differ from the rituals of Hajj, and each of them has its own specificity, and it can be performed in Mecca, but this dream about seeing Umrah can The dreamer comes to many people, and we mention them to you: It is considered one of the dreams that indicate goodness and blessings in the dreamer’s life. Also, seeing the dreamer performing Umrah rituals can indicate his integrity in religion and that he can stay away from evil. Also, Umrah in a dream is one of the signs. Which indicates the dreamer’s good deeds and good deeds. While commentators differed in the interpretation and vision of Umrah in a dream, this is due to the details that he can see in his dream. Also, seeing Umrah in a dream is considered by a person to be the death of worry and sadness for the dreamer, and God knows best. However, seeing An unmarried young man performing Umrah in a dream is good news of his marriage to a girl with good morals. As stated in the vision of the dreamer going to Umrah, it is a sign of repentance to God for what he has done. It is worth noting that Umrah for an unmarried girl is a source of sustenance and blessing for human beings. And that she intends to change her life. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing tamarind with details from Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabul. Dreaming of going to Umrah and not performing Umrah. We may see many dreams in her dreams and hope that they will come true, unlike many dreams that we also do not wish to come true, and the dream of going to Umrah and not performing Umrah. The dreamer can be considered one of the dreams that came to be interpreted: -This can be considered a sign that God is not satisfied with that person, and God knows best. It is also evidence that this person has committed many sins and transgressions. It is worth noting that the dreamer must return To God Almighty and approach Him by seeing this vision. While whoever intends to perform Umrah, and the vision comes to him to lead it, it is one of the signs of fulfilling this intention on the ground, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a white dog in a dream. I see going to Umrah with my mother. You may wish a lot Of mothers visiting the House of God, and this may be considered the desire of many people and is not limited to mothers only, but that vision of me going for Umrah with my mother, the monarch promised the following: This vision is one of the signs of the mother of that dreamer’s assistance to him in the numerical matters of life, and God knows best. Also, it Of the human beings who got rid of the traps present with him thanks to his mother. It is also a sign of a life full of peace and tranquility with the mother. While it is one of the signs that the dreamer will always be satisfied with his mother. While the vision of performing Umrah with the dead mother, it came in one of the Signs of goodness and blessing that await this dreamer, and God knows best. Many interpreters interpreted the vision

title: Interpretation of a dream about fish in a dream in detail

preview.html: Many people are interested in knowing the interpretation of the vision that appears to them in a dream, especially if this vision is common, such as seeing fish in a dream in which the dreamer can eat the fish, clean it, buy it, etc. That appear in the vision, so we will examine in detail what dream interpreters mentioned in the interpretation of seeing fish in a dream. Interpretation of seeing locusts in a dream by Ibn Sirin... financial crises and deception. Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream. Dream interpreters say that seeing a fish in a dream indicates that the dreamer He puts in a lot of effort to get halal money from his current job. Fishing in a dream indicates to an unmarried man that he will marry the girl he loves and wants to have a relationship with. Fishing in a man’s dream may indicate the emergence of a special travel opportunity that will appear before this man in the near future. Interpretation Seeing a well in a dream by Ibn Sirin...the necessity of marriage and halal money. Interpretation of buying fish in a dream. Buying fish in a dream of an anxious or sad person indicates that with the strength of his faith he will overcome this sadness soon. Buying fish in a dream for someone who was suffering from diseases and health problems, indicates On the approach to healing by the command of God Almighty. Ibn Sirin says that buying fish in a dream indicates financial prosperity and a high standard of living for the dreamer. Buying fresh fish in a dream is one of the signs of abundant living that the dreamer will gain. Interpretation of a dream about apples in a dream by Ibn Sirin... Love and ease For childbirth. Interpretation of seeing yourself cleaning fish in a dream: Cleaning fish for a married woman foretells that this woman will overcome the trials and difficulties she faces at this time. Cleaning fish for a pregnant woman is one of the signs that this woman has passed the fatigue stage of pregnancy. Cleaning the fish can indicate It also indicates that the dreamer will get rid of the fraudsters and liars present in his social life environment. Fahd Al-Osaimi says that cleaning the fish from the scale may indicate that the dreamer has abandoned the wrong actions and behaviors that he performed in the previous days. Cleaning the fish also indicates that the dreamer will move away from friends. Bad things in his life. Interpretation of seeing Paradise in a dream by Ibn Sirin... joy and closer to God. Interpretation of eating fish in a dream: Eating fresh fish that is delicious in taste can be a sign of great profits from the work in which the dreamer works. Eating grilled fish indicates that the dreamer He will face some challenges and problems, but he will overcome these adversities, God willing. Eating fried fish in a dream may indicate the fulfillment of a difficult desire that the dreamer seeks. Eating fish with some people who are familiar and close to the dreamer indicates that there is love, attachment, and sincerity of feelings between them. An unmarried girl who eats delicious fish in a dream foretells that she will marry a wealthy man who is close to God Almighty, generous and has many desirable qualities. Interpretation of dreams about drinking coffee in a dream... good news and wisdom. Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a hairstyle in a dream... Good things come

title: Interpretation of seeing white cloth in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing white cloth in a dream is an indication of happy and enjoyable omens, especially if it is in white, as the dream of white cloth indicates success, happiness, and goodness in life. The interpretation of the dream of white cloth varies depending on the social status of the dreamer. The white cloth is clean or dirty. Clean white cloth brings goodness, success and great power to visions, unlike dirty white cloth. This is why we discuss in detail in this article on the Encyclopedia of Dream Interpretation website about white cloth in a dream. First: Interpretation of seeing white cloth in a dream: Dreaming of a clean white cloth brings goodness to the dreamer, and also suggests a life that brings happiness, contentment, affection, and sustenance, and seeing the cloth White in general in a dream means the fulfillment of the visionary’s dream and the ability to reach what the dreamer wants to achieve, and also seeing a clean white dress or cloth means the collapse of the problems, difficulties, crises and disagreements that the visionary is going through. Second: Interpretation of the dream of white cloth for unmarried women: The cloth White in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that she is a girl characterized by good morals, and she walks on the straight path and does not violate the teachings of her religion. The white dress indicates the arrival of a handsome, righteous young man who will propose to her wedding, and a white piece of cloth in a girl’s dream indicates that her life partner suits her, seeks to make her happy, and is characterized by his loyalty. And his sincerity. This goodness obtains a suitable new job, excellence in study or success at work, and an unmarried girl who sees unclean white cloth means that she is falling into a failed romantic relationship, or perhaps it is. Third: Interpretation of a dream about white cloth for a married woman: Seeing a woman A married woman wearing a white dress or white cloth means that she is a loyal, loyal and just wife, seeking to make her husband and children happy and trying to solve the problems that are going on between her and her husband. Or between her and her family members, and seeing white cloth in a dream indicates her desire to have a happy, happy, and stable life, as well as her desire to be free from worries arising from the many difficulties she faces in life. . Such as a white cloth or seeing the color white in general is a sign of hearing the news of pregnancy, especially if the dreamer is suffering from major health problems that prevent pregnancy or if the dreamer has lost hope of getting pregnant, but if she is married and the woman sees the white cloth dirty, then this dream carries within it She will encounter major problems and conflicts and try to solve them, but she will fail to get rid of them, and these problems are often related to her married life. Fourth: Interpretation of a dream about white cloth for a pregnant woman: Dream interpreters have confirmed that seeing a pregnant woman wearing white clothes or seeing white cloth or buying it is evidence of... Her safety and the safety of the baby after her birth, so her birth will be easy and she will not suffer from any difficulty or pain, but if the pregnant woman sees that the white cloth is dirty, this is not good news for the safety of the baby.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a wide bay

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a wide vulva for one girl. If an unmarried girl sees a wide vulva in a dream. Evidence of her ability to overcome many of the difficulties she experiences in life. When an unmarried girl sees a wide vulva during her sleep. Evidence that it will portend something bad that will happen. For him, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing great joy in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees great joy in her dream is an expression that she will become pregnant soon. Great joy like iron in a married woman’s dream. Expressing that he will go through financial difficulties and that he will be exposed to many psychological crises, and God knows best. This dream may indicate that this woman cannot have children. Interpretation of seeing great joy in a pregnant woman’s dream. When a pregnant woman sees a wide vagina in her dream and that she will become a male, this is an expression that she will give birth to a male child. But when she sees in her dream a wide vagina and touches it, this indicates However, she will feel great happiness in the coming period. Seeing tremendous joy in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the great good that this woman will obtain in the coming period of her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream of blood coming out of the vagina for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing great joy in a divorced woman’s dream, certainly. When she sees a wide vulva. It is an expression that she will get rid of all her sorrows and problems. They will receive a lot of good news. But when the vulva is seen in the form of iron in a dream, this is evidence that she is suffering from troubles and sorrows. Interpretation of a dream of a wide vagina for a man in a dream. Seeing great joy for a man in The dream is evidence that he will be promoted and that he will receive a lot of money. A man who sees a wide bay may indicate that he needs to earn some money in the form of zakat. A dream in which a man sees a woman’s vagina is an expression of many good things that the man will receive In his next life. A man seeing in his sleep the vagina of a woman who works with him as a warrior is good news of the great sunrise. As for a man who looks at a woman’s vagina, he feels lust. It is an expression that this person does many bad things. If a man sees in his dream his wife pleasing from behind. Evidence that he is making great efforts to earn a living. But he was unable to do so. A man looks at a small woman’s vagina. It is something that expresses that he has succeeded in defeating all his enemies. But when a person sees a wide abyss, this is evidence that he will suffer a crushing defeat, and God knows best. A man He sees in a dream that he is healing his wife’s joy. It is something that shows the marital happiness that this person experiences with his wife. When a man sees a woman’s vagina in a dream, this woman also had a valuable opinion. It is an expression that he will get rid of all his sorrows. Interpretation of a dream about having a clean bay in a dreamWhen A clean vagina is seen in a dream for a woman or a man. It is an expression of a life full of happiness and joy. A man sees pure joy in a dream. It is an expression of an increase in his salary or that he will obtain a higher position.
